oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Election returns for Confederate President for 6th Civil District of Lawrence County
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The sixth district was west and south of Lawrenceburg near the Lincoln County Line. The talley sheet shows the results of electing electors to vote in the Confederate Presidential election as well as a representative to the Confederate Congress. The backside has a printed slate of the electors to stand for Jefferson Davis and Alexander H. Stephens for president and vice-president, respectively and Lee (short for Leonidas) M. Bentley for Confederate Congress. Bentley was a Lawrenceburg native.
